0e1e4ce9-d9cb-4913-b676-c223603a2b1c.description: The Actualized Performance Cycle is a powerful assessment suite that has been used extensively in executive coaching, leader development, and team building and is the subject of Dr. Sparks' newly released book, “Actualized Leadership: Meeting Your Shadow and Maximizing Your Potential” (SHRM, 2019). alignments.name: International Coach Federation (ICF) CCE
alignments.description: A CCE program is intended for coaches who already have ICF Credentials or who have completed basic coach training. A CCE program may include advanced coach training that directly relates to or expands upon the ICF Core Competencies, and/or training in skills that contribute to the professional development of a coach. 21 credit hours.

alignments.name: SHRM Recertification Provider
alignments.description: Recognized as a provider of choice by SHRM-certified professionals. Being identified as a SHRM Recertification Provider eliminates the guesswork for credential-holders, who will know by your status that your program qualifies for recertification credits. 21 credit hours.

alignments.name: HRCI Approved Provider
alignments.description: HR-themed continuous learning programs are vital members of the HRCI community through the HRCI Approved Provider (AP) program. All HRCI-credentialed professionals rely on AP-approved events and activities to earn recertification credits required to maintain their credentials — making our AP programs what they look for and select to attend.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Actualized Performance Cycle Facilitator Training, designed for both internal talent development professionals and external consultants. Based on the work of Carl Jung, Abraham Maslow, Wilfred Bion, and Jerry Harvey, this certification program will allow you to become certified in the Actualized Leader Profile (ALP), the short-form Free ALP, the ALP360 and the Group Culture Profile (GCP), as well becoming an associate of Sparks & Associates. ICF, SHRM, and HRCI CCE included.
